title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Online Mathematics Education Design for Responding to the COVID-19 Pandemic

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level math fundamentals and experience with LMS (Learning Management System)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design digital learning materials to explain mathematical concepts using various online tools
Learners can develop personalized math problem sets for asynchronous environments and apply them to an LMS
Learners can complete project-based math assignments including peer evaluation using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
